#include<stdio.h>
int find(int *prime, int i){
	while(i<101){
		if(!prime[i])
			return i;
	i++;
	}
	return 102;
}
int main() {
	int i, prime[10001] = { 0 }, j, n, T;
	float count;
	//freopen("SHUTTLE.txt", "r", stdin);
	scanf("%d", &T);
	i=2;
	while(i<101){
		for (j = i + 1; j < 10001; j++) {
			if (j % i == 0)
				prime[j] = 1;
		}
		i++;
		i=find(prime,i);
	}
	while (T--) {
		scanf("%d", &n);
		if (prime[n] == 0)
			printf("%d\n", n - 1);
		else {
			count = n;
			for (i = 2; i < n; i++)
				if (prime[i] == 0 && n % i == 0)
					count *= (float)(i - 1) / i;
			printf("%.0f\n", count);

		}
	}
}
